epic.name: MULTI-TASK MOD
epic.description: Increases Weapon Power by 10%. [Fusion Cannons] can now be fired while using [Defense Matrix].

rare.name: DAE-HYUN'S DETONATOR
rare.description: Provides 15% Ability Lifesteal. If your [Mech] detonates while mid-air, increase [Self-Destruct] explosion damage and range by 200%.

rare.name: MASTERMIND'S MITIGATOR
rare.description: Every 300 damage you mitigate with [Defense Matrix] reduces [Micro Missiles] cooldown by 1s.

rare.name: VESUVIUS PROTOCOL
rare.description: Increases Ability Power by 10%. Using [Self-Destruct] drops lava nearby that deals 30 damage every 1s.

epic.name: BUSAN BLASTER
epic.description: Increases Ability Power by 20%. [Light Gun] gains a secondary fire, which charges up to fire a explosive piercing shot that deals 80 damage.

epic.name: MACRO MISSILE
epic.description: [Micro Missiles] deal 25% increased damage and have significantly increased knockback.

epic.name: ONSLAUGHT ORDINANCE
epic.description: Increases Ability Power by 15%. The quantity and duration of [Micro Missiles] is increased by 20%.

rare.name: GALVANIZED CORE
rare.description: Increases Health by 25. Increases [Boosters] Duration by 25%.

rare.name: PLOT ARMOR
rare.description: Increases Armor by 25. While [Defense Matrix] is active, gain 65% damage reduction against beams.

rare.name: SOLO SPEC
rare.description: Increases Health by 25. When you mitigate damage with [Defense Matrix], gain Shields equal to 10% of the damage mitigated, up to 100. Resets when your [Mech] is destroyed.

epic.name: APM AMP
epic.description: Increases Shields by 50. When you use [Boosters], other allies within 16m gain 25% Move Speed for 2s.

epic.name: CHIP-DAMAGE DIVERTER
epic.description: Increases Health by 50. When you deal damage to Barriers while in your [Mech], gain Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt, up to 200. Resets when your [Mech] is destroyed.

epic.name: SINGIJEON'S PULSE PLATING
epic.description: Increases Health by 50. Gain 5% of damage mitigated by [Defense Matrix] as Ultimate Charge.

epic.name: NANO COLAâ„¢ NITROUS
epic.description: Increases Health by 50. When you eject from your [Mech], gain 25% increased max Health and gain [Nano Boost] for 8s.

powers.title: FOCUSED FUSION
powers.description: [Fusion Cannon]'s spread is reduced by 66% and damage falloff range is 20m farther.

powers.title: LEGENDARY LOADOUT
powers.description: [Micro Missiles] are replaced with 6 Heavy Rockets, which deal 350% more explosive damage and have 100% increased radius.

powers.title: COUNTERMEASURES
powers.description: When you mitigate 150 damage with [Defense Matrix], automatically fire 2 [Micro Missiles].

powers.title: FACETANKING
powers.description: [Defense Matrix] heals you for 30% of the damage it blocks.

powers.title: ULTRAWIDE MATRIX
powers.description: Increase the size of [Defense Matrix] by 50% and its duration by 20%.

powers.title: IGNITION BURST
powers.description: [Boosters] leave a trail of lava that deals 30 damage every 1s.

powers.title: MEKA PUNCH
powers.description: While using [Boosters], [Quick Melee] deals 75% more damage. MEKA Punch eliminations reset the cooldown of [Boosters].

powers.title: STAT BOOST
powers.description: During the first 2s of [Boosters], [Defense Matrix] recovers 100% faster.

powers.title: TOKKI SLAM
powers.description: During [Boosters], use crouch to slam the ground, dealing damage equal to 20% of your max Armor and knocking up enemies hit.

powers.title: PARTY PROTECTOR
powers.description: When you use [Self-Destruct], allies within [Self-Destruct] radius gain 250 Overhealth for 8s.
